channel.title: How do i make commands?
channel.description: :mad: i dont know how to make commands... what i do is i press Ctrl + F to find. i search army (for example) then i replace the army command with 'adminarmour' then i replace the item ids with the armour i want. i save it then compile and i go on my server type ::adminarmour and nothing happens!!! please tell me what i do wrong.!

item.title: How do i make commands?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

yea search the tut section chances are someone will have the command ur looking for

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make commands?
item.dc:creator: @phantom_ice phantom ice
item.description:
@phantom_ice wrote:

:mad:
i dont know how to make commands…
what i do is i press Ctrl + F to find. i search army (for example) then i replace the army command with ‘adminarmour’ then i replace the item ids with the armour i want. i save it then compile and i go on my server type ::adminarmour and nothing happens!!!
please tell me what i do wrong.!

Read full topic
